item.title: 'Do not panic buy': Ardern extends Auckland level 3 lockdown
item.description:
Aucklanders are being urged not to panic buy and have been offered a wave of extra financial support as the city heads into another 12 days of level 3.
The fortnight in lockdown will mean personal sacrifices ...
